programme.desc: Stage 1: Hermanus High School 112km. Hermanus hosts the first race village for two nights with the 112km first stage, that features 2 700m of climbing, starting from the high school.

programme.title: Absa Cape Epic HL '19: Stage 2
programme.desc: Stage 2: Hermanus High School / Oak Valley Estate 86km. Hermanus hosts the first race village for two nights with the 112km first stage, that features 2 700m of climbing, starting from the high school.

programme.title: Absa Cape Epic HL '19: Stage 3
programme.desc: Stage 3: Oak Valley Estate 103km. The 103km third stage, which covers 2800m, starts and finishes at Oak Valley and is punctuated by four major climbs.

programme.title: Absa Cape Epic HL '19: Stage 4
programme.desc: Stage 4: Oak Valley Estate TT 43km. The single-track filled time-trial fourth stage consists of a 43km ride with 1000m of climbing.

programme.title: Absa Cape Epic HL '19: Stage 5
programme.desc: Stage 5: Oak Valley Estate / University of Stellenbosch 100km. Riders need to conquer the 100km queen stage with 2850m of climbing from Oak Valley to the student town.

programme.title: Absa Cape Epic HL '19: Stage 6
programme.desc: Stage 6: University of Stellenbosch 89km. The sixth stage, which features an 89km ride with 2650m of climbing, treats riders to single-track, vineyard climbs and downhill thrills.

programme.title: Absa Cape Epic HL '19: Stage 7
programme.desc: Stage 7: University of Stellenbosch / Val de Vie Estate 70km. The grand finale takes riders on a 70km journey with 1800m of climbing into Jonkershoek Trails before concluding the eight-day untamed African mountain biking experience.

programme.title: Absa Cape Epic HL '19: (M)
programme.desc: Men. After eight days, 624 kilometres, and 16650 metres of climbing we refocus attention on the truly untamed route that lies between the Prologue at the University of Cape Town and the Grand Finale at Val de Vie Estate.

programme.title: Absa Cape Epic HL '19: (W)
programme.desc: Women. After eight days, 624 kilometres, and 16650 metres of climbing we refocus attention on the truly untamed route that lies between the Prologue at the University of Cape Town and the Grand Finale at Val de Vie Estate.

programme.title: Absa Cape Epic HL '20: Documentary
